entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:14 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
